ActivityMetadata.Name: GH List notifications for the authenticated user
ActivityMetadata.Label: GH List notifications for the authenticated user
ActivityMetadata.Description: List all notifications for the current user, sorted by most recently updated.
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Github

List notifications for the authenticated user

List all notifications for the current user, sorted by most recently updated.

Method: Get

OperationID: activity/list-notifications-for-authenticated-user

EndPoint:

/notifications
